name: SheepX
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg. In this seminar we design a small game with a new theme every week.

The theme for this week was: "Physics"

Game Description:

You are the first sheep SheepX has send to space to test the rocket land with sheep passengers. To make SheepElon proud, you want to make sure nothing bad happens, but everything goes according to plan.

Key Features:

  • Baaahhh
  • Redirecting Fuel
  • Falling Down
  • Landing on a Plattform (Hopefully)
  • Saving SheepX from a bad reputation

Credits:

Denschstar - Coding & Leveldesign

vinzzman - Coding & Leveldesign & UI

University of Applied Sciences Europe

Dieses Spiel wurde  an der University of Applied Sciences Europe produziert.

Supervised by: Lena Falkenhagen

"One Game Per Week"  (Sommersemester 2021)
